description:
Grey days get better with boots that make you smile. Rain boots don’t all need to look black and dour, the Abigail brings a little style to the world of Wellingtons.

  • Seam sealed waterproof construction
  • Cozy, quilted flannel collar
  • Brushed fleece lining holds in your natural warmth and wicks away moisture
  • Removeable insole has a rich Sherpa fleece footbed
  • Kamik’s lightweight synthetic RubberHe is PVC-free, waterproof, durable and recyclable
  • RubberHe is rated to 1,000,000 flexes and is unaffected by weather down to -32°C, offering excellent traction in any weather
  • Kamik’s Town outsole offers great grip in wet weather
name: Kamik Abigail Waterproof Boots - Women's
